name: HarlequinMattress
0: ”Alexa, turn on light on My Bed”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Use Alexa to adjust your HARLEQUIN®-powered comfort bed through the Harlequin Mattress App. This Action supports LA18 IC advanced actuator system. The Action works via a Wi-Fi box (WiFi2LIN001) connecting the bed to the internet.
Use the Harlequin Mattress app to connect your bed to Wifi, set memory positions, remote control your bed, and create an account to connect to skills.

Features available via the HARLEQUIN® skill:

- Control up to four favourite positions of your HARLEQUIN®-powered comfort bed.
- Move your HARLEQUIN®-powered comfort bed to flat position.
- Turn under bed light ON and OFF.
- Turn massage ON and OFF (if supported by your bed system).

These skills work with the Harlequin Mattress app. The app is required to create an account and set up your favorite positions.
